item.title: the Machine in the Garden
item.description: the Machine in the Garden is one of the premiere ethereal-electronic-darkwave-neoclassical-goth band in the American music industry. With 8 official releases and numerous other appearances since their founding in 1992, tMitG is one of the most lasting and prolific dark underground bands of the new era.

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Miscellany: a collection of rare tracks
item.description: We are happy to announce that many rare tMitG tracks including compilation appearances and selections from When Angel's Peer Favorably Upon Us, as well as some previously unreleased recordings from our archives, are now available on our Bandcamp page

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - CD availability update
item.description: Earlier this month our long-time partnership with Middle Pillar Presents ended

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - New Mirabilis CD coming September 30
item.description: We're proud to announce a new album from Summer's other project, Mirabilis

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Live show in Austin, TX
item.description: Saturday, November 30, 2013 Austin, TX Elysium 705 Red River, Austin, TX with Ego Likeness (12am), Servitor (11pm) and XBRMNT (9pm) Doors open at 8 PM &bull; Show Starts at 8 PM &bull; $9 in advance &bull; $14 at the door &bull; 18+ View the Facebook Event

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Happy Anniversary Veils and Shadows!
item.description: Veils and Shadows EP was recorded 20 years ago this month

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Black Weekend!
item.description: ALL tMitG Bandcamp digital downloads are discounted up to 50%! tmitg

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Holiday Sale!
item.description: All tMitG merchandise in our store is on sale for the month of December! Just use coupon code GOTHCEMBER when checking out via ccnow and get 20% off your entire order

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - Before and After the Storm
item.description: the Machine in the Garden “Before and After the Storm” is the band’s eighth studio album.

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - Places in Between
item.description: the Machine in the Garden “Places in Between” is the band’s ninth studio album.

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Now Available &mdash; Before and After the Storm
item.description:
Digital Version
This is primarily a digital release

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Official Announcement for Before and After the Storm
item.description: the Machine in the Garden and Deus ex Musica are proud to present Before and After the Storm, the band&rsquo;s eighth studio album

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Video teaser for Before and After the Storm
item.description: We made a short teaser video for the new album, viewable on YouTube

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - In the Vanir
item.description: the Machine in the Garden “In the Vanir” is the band’s first digital single and preview for “Before and After the Storm”.

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - tMitG announces new single and forthcoming mini-album
item.description: the Machine in the Garden are proud to announce the availability of their new single, "In the Vanir," on Friday, 10 December 2010

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - tMitG is on Bandcamp
item.description: We've set up a page on Bandcamp as a new method of distributing our music digitally in pretty much any format you could want, including lossless

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Black Friday / Cyber Monday Specials
item.description: 15% off any order from our merchandise page

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - tMitG on Ping
item.description: For those of you on iTunes Ping, we have an artist profile there now

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Free Shipping for World Goth Day
item.description: In celebration of World Goth Day on May 22nd, we're offering free standard shipping on all of our merchandise

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Auf Dem See (Serpentine Mix)
item.description: Well, somehow we forgot to post this: "Auf Dem See" by The Synthetic Dream Foundation, on which Summer performs guest vocals, has been remixed and was released back in February

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - CD Baby will donate $1 toward Haitian earthquake relief for every CD and album download sold.
item.description: Starting on Monday, January 25th and continuing for two weeks, CD Baby will donate $1 of their cut from every CD sale through our website, and $1 from every download sale over $8

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - Holiday Sale
item.description: Head over to our merch page and enjoy 15% off all products through the end of the year

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - A couple tMitG appearances now available to order!
item.description: First, the Attrition covers compilation, "Wrapped in the guise of my friend," is now available to order from Attrition's website

item.title: the Machine in the Garden - news - UPDATE: Wrapped in the guise of my friend
item.description: We now have a release date for the compilation of Attrition covers that tMitG is proud to be included on

item.title: “Control”
item.description: Music by the Machine in the Garden, from their 1999 release One Winter's Night... Video set to Fritz Lang's "Metropolis," originally created in 2001 as a backing video for live shows.

item.title: “Miserere Mei” (Fan Video)
item.description: The Machine in the Garden did a haunting arrangement of Antonio Lotti's "Miserere Mei" piece originally composed during the height of the Renaissance period. I decided to combine the emotional elements of the music with the already tragic anime, Elfen Lied. The song is from their album "One Winter's Night…" and also the "Sex, Death, & Eyeliner" original soundtrack.

item.title: “Miserere Mei” (Fan Video)
item.description: An alternate "Miserere Mei" from the tragic anime, Elfen Lied. The song is from their album "One Winter's Night…" and also the "Sex, Death, & Eyeliner" original soundtrack.

item.description: Filmed at Elysium in Austin, TX on August 30, 2004.

item.title: “The Sleep of Angels” (Fan Video)
item.description: Fan-made video of the Machine in the Garden's track from their album "One Winter's Night…".
